name: MyPlanetFact
0:
”Alexa, open 'My Planet Fact'.”
”Tell me a fact about 'Jupiter'.”
”Tell me the number of moons of 'Mars'.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my planet fact
des:
My Planet Fact skill is created mainly to teach children or even adults who wants to learn about planets in the solar system. Just simply open the skill by asking Alexa to open 'My Planet Fact,' and it will teach you how to begin asking questions. It can tell you a fact about a planet, average/ low/high temperature of a planet, number of moons and a list of moons of a planet and the location of a planet within the solar system.
It is designed in a very simple way for you to get to know more about planets. You just have to say which planet you want to know about and it will tell you about it!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
